element.name: pce_url
element.label: PCE URL
element.key: Full URL of the PCE to connect to, including port. http:// addresses are not supported. If no port is specified, :443 is assumed. Example value: https://my.pce.com:8443

element.name: org_id
element.label: Organization ID
element.key: PCE Organization ID

element.name: api_key_storage
element.label: API Authentication Credentials
element.key: illumio://
Illumio API key username. Example value: 'api_145a5c788e63c30a3'

element.name: tcp_settings
element.key: TCP Syslog Settings

Settings for receiving TCP syslogs from on-prem PCE installations. If a TCP input with the configured port does not exist, one will be created. If the input already exists, this setting will have no effect

element.name: port_number
element.label: Syslog Port (TCP)
element.key: Port for Splunk to receive syslogs from the PCE. Not required syslogs are pulled from S3. Example value: 514

element.name: enable_tcp_ssl
element.key: Enable TCP-SSL
Receive encrypted syslog events from the PCE. Requires [SSL] stanza to be configured in inputs.conf

element.name: port_scan_settings
element.key: Port Scan Settings
Per-PCE configuration settings for detecting port scan events on paired workloads

element.name: port_scan_interval
element.label: Interval
element.key: A port scan alert will be triggered if the scan threshold count is met during this interval (in seconds)

element.name: port_scan_threshold
element.label: Threshold
element.key: Number of scanned ports that triggers a port scan alert

element.name: allowed_ips
element.label: Allowed IPs
element.key: Comma-separated list of source IPs to be ignored by port scan alerts

element.name: quarantine_labels
element.label: Quarantine Labels
element.key: Labels to apply to workloads to put them into a quarantine zone. Must be of the form key1:value1,...,keyN:valueN. Example value: env:E-Quarantine

element.name: ca_cert_path
element.label: CA Certificate Path
element.key: Optional path to a custom CA certificate bundle. Example value: '$SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/TA-Illumio/certs/ca.pem'

element.name: http_proxy
element.label: HTTP Proxy
element.key: Optional HTTP proxy address

element.name: https_proxy
element.label: HTTPS Proxy
element.key: Optional HTTPS proxy address

element.name: http_retry_count
element.label: HTTP Retry Count
element.key: Number of times to retry HTTP requests to the PCE

element.name: http_request_timeout
element.label: HTTP Request Timeout
element.key: Total HTTP request timeout (in seconds)

element.name: interval
element.label: Interval
element.key: Input run schedule in seconds or as a cron expression

element.name: index
element.label: Index
element.key: Destination index for this input

element.name: __ns
element.label: Destination app
element.key: Destination app namespace for this input
